entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
